mapper.select: SELECT to_date(to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'YYYY'),'YYYY') as admin_sales_regdate,sum(admin_sales) as admin_sales FROM admin_sales WHERE to_char(admin_sales_regdate, 'yyyy') >= #{searchConditionFirst} and to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'yyyy') <= #{searchConditionSecond} GROUP BY to_date(to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'YYYY'),'YYYY') ORDER BY to_date(to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'YYYY'),'YYYY') ASC

SELECT to_date(to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'MM'),'MM') as admin_sales_regdate,sum(admin_sales) as admin_sales FROM admin_sales WHERE to_char(admin_sales_regdate, 'yyyy') = #{searchConditionFirst} GROUP BY to_date(to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'MM'),'MM') ORDER BY to_date(to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'MM'),'MM') ASC

SELECT to_date(to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'MM/dd'),'MM/dd') as admin_sales_regdate,sum(admin_sales) as admin_sales FROM admin_sales WHERE to_char(admin_sales_regdate, 'YYYY-MM') = #{searchConditionFirst} GROUP BY to_date(to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'MM/dd'),'MM/dd') ORDER BY to_date(to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'MM/dd'),'MM/dd') ASC

SELECT to_date(to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'YYYY/MM/dd'),'YYYY/MM/dd') as admin_sales_regdate,sum(admin_sales) as admin_sales FROM admin_sales WHERE to_char(admin_sales_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{searchConditionFirst} and to_char(admin_sales_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{searchConditionSecond} GROUP BY to_date(to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'YYYY/MM/dd'),'YYYY/MM/dd') ORDER BY to_date(to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'YYYY/MM/dd'),'YYYY/MM/dd') ASC
